full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,DNGOS GRUB KUN 'BYUNG SKYA RINGS DKAR PO ZHES BYA BA NI, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @017B (DNGOS GRUB KUN 'BYUNG SKYA RINGS DKAR PO ZHES BYA BA 'DI MTSANG 'GROGS AEM CHI DKA' BCU DANG, NGAG DBANG BSTAN 'DZIN GNYIS GZHAN LA PHAN BSAM GYIS YUL 'DI GAR ME LHA MCHOD CING GA-YANG BLANG BA'I BKRA SHIS 'BYUNG 'DUG KYANG LHA BSKYED PA MCHOD PA'I BYIN BRLABS SOGS MED PA'I SOG YIG CHA LHAG CHAD GYI LAG 'DZIN PA 'GA' SNAD MDO, RANG NYID LHA BSKYED PA'I ME MCHOD ZHIG BYED DGOS ZHES BSKUL BA'I MCHOG PAR SBYIN BSREG GI THABS BSKYED` SLOB DPON PADMA'I MDZAD PA'I GA-YANG 'GUGS CHEN MO'I YIG CHA TSIG BCAD DGA' ZHIG BSDUS NAS RAB 'BYAMS @018A *, ,PA NGAG DBANG BSOD NAMS KYI MDZAD PA'I STENG DU, NYER SPYOD LNGA SPEL TSIG DANG BCAS PA LUG GI BRANG DANG MAR KHU DANG CHANG LA SOGS PA'I 'BUL BA NOM CHI GO'I SHRI CHOS RJE BLO BZANG DPAL MGON MING CAN GYIS SUG BRIS SO` 'DI LTAR BGYIS PA NONGS PA CI MCHIS PA, ,BLA MA LHA LA BSHAGS PA'I BZOD PAR GSOL, ,LEGS CHA CUNG ZAD MCHIS PAS GANG THOB DGES, ,'GRO BA RNAMS LA PHAN PA'I RGYUR GYUR CIG ,GA-YANG BKRA SHIS PO'I,, ,,BKRA SHIS DPAL 'BAR 'DZAM GLING BRGYAN DU 'BYON, ,MANGGA LAm, ,DGE'O,, ,,)
